reviewText: Dated appearance and lacking high dollar production, but informative just the same.

This video has been a big help! We had no idea how to trim our horses hooves, and this video took us through it step by step. Over the years it has saved us many dollars, and the hassle of having to schedule someone to do the job for us.
Although a few small details helped, for those who know anything about horses, and hooves it did not help much for mini owners looking to trim their own.  Way too expensive for the content.
